# AVCaptureInput.Port

**Class**

An object that represents a stream of data that a capture input provides.

## Declaration

```swift
class Port
```

## Overview

Instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureInput] have one or more input ports, one for each data stream they can produce. For example, an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDeviceInput] object presenting one video data stream has one port.

## Inspecting an input port

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the port is in an enabled state.
- **mediaType**: The media type of the port.
- **formatDescription**: A description of the port format.
- **sourceDeviceType**: The device type of the source camera that provides data to the port.
- **sourceDevicePosition**: The position of the source device providing input through this port.
- **clock**: An object that represents the capture device’s clock.

## Observing format changes

- **formatDescriptionDidChangeNotification**: A notification the system posts when the capture input port’s format description changes.

## Accessing the input

- **input**: The input object that owns the port.

## Accessing ports

- **ports**: The ports available on a capture input.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
